question: Which educational institution has proposed to set up a Centre of Excellence for the Indian Knowledge System?
explanation:
The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur has proposed to set up a Centre of Excellence for the Indian Knowledge System.
This information has been furnished by the Union Education Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank. This was announced at the inaugural session of an international webinar titled ‘Bharata Tirtha’ organised by IIT Kharagpur.
